product_name: Merrell Extant Tablet Mini Messenger - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Simplify with the Merrell Extant Tablet Mini Messenger. It carries just what you need without all the clutter. Padded tablet sleeve in the water-resistant, zippered main compartment carries your Kindle or iPad. Internal organization sleeves on lining; cleanly finished interior with bound construction seams. Quilted back panel delivers padded comfort. Water-resistant top and bottom panels keep the rain at bay while you pedal or walk. Made from cotton canvas with a lightweight polyurethane finish on the backside; durable water repellent finish resists moisture and stains. Adjustable shoulder strap. Closeout.
short_description: Simplify with the Merrell Extant Tablet Mini Messenger. It carries just what you need without all the clutter.
